name: build
info: Process command and option database to generate static documentation files

name: cleanup
info: Apply organization rules to restructure local files

name: compress
info: Compress saved files into .tar.gz archives

name: count
info: Count inputs or current selection

name: download
info: Fetch a URL and archive the returned data

name: dry
info: Execute a 'dry run'; don't modify any files

name: extract
info: Move a database path to a separate 'block' and store a reference in the original database

params.name: path
params.info: The section of the database to transfer

name: ffind
info: Find a file in the database (based on its name)

name: help
info: Display help information; lists subcommands if no argument is given

name: imfind
info: Find images containing the specified text

params.name: query
params.info: The text you want to search for

name: limit
info: Limit the number of results an action returns

name: manifest
info: Gather information about a directory and its contents

name: note
info: Subcommands associated with notetaking functionality

name: open
info: Open the selection by creating a temporary directory with symlinks to its files

name: plain
info: Plain output; strips away the outermost layer of JSON formatting for compatibility between bash and jq

name: process
info: Extract data from files to build databases

name: rose
info: Display a randomly generated mosaic, for fun

name: status
info: Display information about the main ao database

name: summarize
info: Compute a summary of a specified property/path over the database

name: update
info: Merge file snapshots into filenodes

name: utodo
info: Executes utodo.sh, updating any todo lists specified in your ao_config.sh

name: verbose
info: Print additional information about what the program is doing
